name: ZeroClaw
short_description: Autonomous Rust AI assistant runtime with pluggable providers and secure local gateway.
description: Autonomous Rust AI assistant runtime with pluggable providers and secure local gateway. ZeroClaw is a self-hosted application focused on ai, tools, utility, self-hosted. It can be deployed on any device via Docker Compose.
usecases: Self-host ZeroClaw on your home server to autonomous rust ai assistant runtime with pluggable providers and secure local gateway without depending on third-party cloud services.
Use ZeroClaw to manage your ai workflows privately, keeping all data under your control on local infrastructure.
